attributes.action: follow Japanese practice in the provision of flats for all MP's requiring accommodation in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Japanese are refurbishing a Governemt owned building to provide utilitarian flats for MP's who require accommodation in the capital. Those who do not wish to use it pay their own way.This should be followed as the solution in London thus minimisung the cost to the taxpayer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
